DOC.brief_summary: To determine the effects of instrument-applied chiropractic manipulative therapy (CMT) on postural control.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Controlled Single-Blind Study of the Effects of Instrument-Applied Spinal Manipulative Therapy on Postural Control
DOC.criteria: Students, staff or faculty No previous lower extremity injury, surgery, visual or vestibular condition that would affect balance Systemic illness that could have an adverse effect on balance Local infection, injury or other malignancy affecting the lower extremity any unstable joints of the lower extremity Any Spinal manipulation within 48 hours Prescription or herbal muscle stimulants, relaxants, etc. that could affect balance Pregnancy
